content: gudetama pattern copyright © 2024 by hook & yarn this is an original design and for personal use only any portion may not be reproduced or used in any manner hooknyarn id@gmail com introduction thank you for your purchase this pattern is originally designed by hook & yarn and for personal use only the pattern may not be reproduced or used in any manner however you may sell the finished product in small mass but please credit the designer please read to the end of the pattern before you start the project some of the parts are connected to each other so do not fasten_off the yarn unless being told for example legs-body-head are connected together feel free to adjust color or add some attributes according to your personal taste if you have any questions or feedbacks please contact me on instagram @hooknyarn id or email to hooknyarn id@gmail com happy crocheting difficulty easy size approx 7cm tall using yarn in size #2 sport/fine and 2 20mm crochet hook materials & tools abbreviations yellow yarn chain chain stitch black yarn st s stitch es white yarn single_crochet single_crochet fiberfill for stuffing double_crochet double_crochet crochet hook slip_stitch slip_stitch tapestry needles flo front loop only scissors blo back loop only glue or hot glue gun increase increase 2sc in one st decrease decrease 2sc together total stitches on that row xx repeat x times legs make 2 use yellow yarn row 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 row 2 single_crochet increase x3 9 row 3 single_crochet in all 9 st 9 row 4 3 single_crochet increase x2 single_crochet 11 row 5 single_crochet in all 11 st 11 leg #1 fasten_off leg #2 do not fasten_off yet continue working on the body body to head use yellow yarn make 2 chain then join the leg #1 with slip_stitch row 1 11 single_crochet 2 single_crochet at flo 11 single_crochet 2 single_crochet at flo 26 row 2 increase 2 single_crochet increase 6 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet increase 6 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet 32 row 3 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet increase 20 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet increase single_crochet 36 row 4-5 single_crochet in all 36 st 36 row 6 single_crochet decrease 3 single_crochet decrease 20 single_crochet decrease 3 single_crochet decrease single_crochet 32 row 7 5 single_crochet decrease 18 single_crochet decrease 5 single_crochet 30 row 8 single_crochet decrease x2 18 single_crochet decrease single_crochet x2 26 row 9 single_crochet in all 26 st 26 row 10 9 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet decrease 9 single_crochet 24 row 11-13 single_crochet in all 24 st 24 row 14 5 single_crochet decrease x3 3 single_crochet 21 row 15 4 single_crochet decrease x3 3 single_crochet 18 row 16 3 single_crochet decrease x3 3 single_crochet 15 row 17 2 single_crochet decrease x3 3 single_crochet 12 stuff legs and body with fiberfill row 18 decrease x6 6 fasten_off and leave tail long enough for backside hands make 2 use yellow yarn row 1 make 4 chain 4 row 2 on second chain
